summary.notes: Many pages were flagged based on legitimate multilingual philosophical content (French, German, Greek, Latin terminology is expected in Derrida scholarship). The automated system appears to flag: (1) sophisticated English vocabulary, (2) proper foreign language terms, (3) philosophical neologisms like 'différance', 'phallogocentrism', 'anthropologistic'. True corruption shows as: word fragmentation, missing letters, nonsense character strings, incomplete German/French beyond missing diacritics. Pages with empty evidence lists [] yet high confidence scores are almost always false positives.
